name: Coconut Charcoal Cake
description: A dark-colored pastry. The Ajilenakh Nuts were first roasted and powdered before being sieved, added to a batter, mixed evenly, and then baked. The final product by no means looks impressive, but it exudes the fresh aroma of Ajilenakh Nuts, and it tastes better still with some jam.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Coconut Charcoal Cake
suspicious.description: A dark-colored pastry. One look is all it takes to tell that this is a disaster dish and a half. Your immense courage in trying one bite is rewarded with a supremely dry, coarse mouthfeel... Is this some kind of mistake? Was the charcoal plated up instead of the cake?
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

normal.name: Coconut Charcoal Cake
normal.description: A dark-colored pastry. The Ajilenakh Nuts were first roasted and powdered before being sieved, added to a batter, mixed evenly, and then baked. The final product by no means looks impressive, but it exudes the fresh aroma of Ajilenakh Nuts, and it tastes better still with some jam.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Coconut Charcoal Cake
delicious.description: A dark-colored pastry. The pastry is fine, almost lustrous, and the fragrance of the Ajilenakh Nuts is both vivid and full of warmth. The cake is fluffy and delicate as it enters your mouth, exorcising exhaustion and muzzling misery. Ah, just as a book may not be judged by its cover, so too should a cake not be convicted by its crust.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.
